summary: This document is a brief internal communication regarding the addition of inmate Jeffrey Epstein to a roster (CFSA roster) and an interview with another inmate, Encarnacion. It contains a standard DOJ confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Added to the CFSA roster at the correctional facility.

persons.name: Encarnacion
persons.context: Interviewed and added to the CFSA roster.

persons.name: Supervisory Chaplain FCI Ray Brook
persons.context: Author or subject of the communication; the document is addressed from or to this position.

events.title: Epstein added to CFSA roster
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein was added to the CFSA roster at the correctional facility.

events.title: Interview of inmate Encarnacion
events.description: Inmate Encarnacion was interviewed and subsequently added to the CFSA roster.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate and was added to a specific facility roster (CFSA roster).
Another inmate, Encarnacion, was also interviewed and added to the same roster.
The document is a privileged communication from the U.S. Department of Justice concerning sensitive information.
